body:
### Steps to reproduce the issue

<!-- Fill in the exact spec you are trying to build and the relevant part of the error message -->
```console
$ spack install scotch
==> Installing scotch-6.0.10-z3boighq26j7sxlns52td3geqy4iim4f
==> No binary for scotch-6.0.10-z3boighq26j7sxlns52td3geqy4iim4f found: installing from source
/Users/cessenat/Softs/spack/lib/spack/spack/architecture.py:205: UserWarning: microarchitecture specific optimizations are not supported yet on mixed compiler toolchains [check apple-clang@11.0.0 for further details]
  warnings.warn(msg.format(compiler))
==> Using cached archive: /Users/cessenat/Softs/spack/var/spack/cache/_source-cache/archive/fd/fd8b707b8200823312a1571d97d3776ff3dfd3280cfa4b6e38987153cea5dbda.tar.gz
==> Ran patch() for scotch
==> scotch: Executing phase: 'install'
==> Error: ProcessError: Command exited with status 2:
    'make' '-j1' 'scotch'

4 errors found in build log:
     65    /Users/cessenat/Softs/spack/lib/spack/env/clang/clang -O3 -DCOMMON_RANDOM_FIXED_SEED -DSCOTCH_DET
           ERMINISTIC -DSCOTCH_RENAME -DIDXSIZE32 -Drestrict=__restrict -fPIC -DCOMMON_FILE_COMPRESS_GZ -DCO
           MMON_PTHREAD -DCOMMON_PTHREAD_BARRIER -dynamiclib -fPIC -c bgraph_check.c -o bgraph_check.o -DSCO
           TCH_VERSION_NUM=6 -DSCOTCH_RELEASE_NUM=0 -DSCOTCH_PATCHLEVEL_NUM=10
     66    clang: warning: argument unused during compilation: '-dynamiclib' [-Wunused-command-line-argument
           ]
     67    /Users/cessenat/Softs/spack/lib/spack/env/clang/clang -O3 -DCOMMON_RANDOM_FIXED_SEED -DSCOTCH_DET
           ERMINISTIC -DSCOTCH_RENAME -DIDXSIZE32 -Drestrict=__restrict -fPIC -DCOMMON_FILE_COMPRESS_GZ -DCO
           MMON_PTHREAD -DCOMMON_PTHREAD_BARRIER -dynamiclib -fPIC -c bgraph_store.c -o bgraph_store.o -DSCO
           TCH_VERSION_NUM=6 -DSCOTCH_RELEASE_NUM=0 -DSCOTCH_PATCHLEVEL_NUM=10
     68    clang: warning: argument unused during compilation: '-dynamiclib' [-Wunused-command-line-argument
           ]
     69    /Users/cessenat/Softs/spack/lib/spack/env/clang/clang -O3 -DCOMMON_RANDOM_FIXED_SEED -DSCOTCH_DET
           ERMINISTIC -DSCOTCH_RENAME -DIDXSIZE32 -Drestrict=__restrict -fPIC -DCOMMON_FILE_COMPRESS_GZ -DCO
           MMON_PTHREAD -DCOMMON_PTHREAD_BARRIER -dynamiclib -fPIC -c common.c -DSCOTCH_COMMON_RENAME -o com
           mon.o
     70    clang: warning: argument unused during compilation: '-dynamiclib' [-Wunused-command-line-argument
           ]
  >> 71    common.c:116:3: error: implicit declaration of function 'gettimeofday' is invalid in C99 [-Werror
           ,-Wimplicit-function-declaration]
     72      gettimeofday (&tv, NULL);
     73      ^
     74    1 error generated.
  >> 75    make[2]: *** [common.o] Error 1
  >> 76    make[1]: *** [scotch] Error 2
  >> 77    make: *** [libscotch] Error 2

See build log for details:
  /var/folders/53/vwnr5jhj4h3cgvt1y6w3wgmh0000gn/T/cessenat/spack-stage/spack-stage-scotch-6.0.10-z3boighq26j7sxlns52td3geqy4iim4f/spack-build-out.txt


```

### Information on your system

<!-- Please include the output of `spack debug report` -->
* **Spack:** 0.16.1-2763-bd47eaf0f8
* **Python:** 3.8.2
* **Platform:** darwin-bigsur-skylake
* **Concretizer:** original

<!-- If you have any relevant configuration detail (custom `packages.yaml` or `modules.yaml`, etc.) you can add that here as well. -->

### Additional information

<!-- Please upload the following files. They should be present in the stage directory of the failing build. Also upload any config.log or similar file if one exists. -->
* [spack-build-out.txt](https://github.com/spack/spack/files/6514628/spack-build-out.txt)
* [spack-build-env.txt](https://github.com/spack/spack/files/6514630/spack-build-env.txt)


<!-- Some packages have maintainers who have volunteered to debug build failures. Run `spack maintainers <name-of-the-package>` and @mention them here if they exist. -->

### General information

<!-- These boxes can be checked by replacing [ ] with [x] or by clicking them after submitting the issue. -->
- [x] I have run `spack debug report` and reported the version of Spack/Python/Platform
- [x] I have run `spack maintainers <name-of-the-package>` and @mentioned any maintainers
- [x] I have uploaded the build log and environment files
- [x] I have searched the issues of this repo and believe this is not a duplicate
title: Installation issue: scotch
